ARABIC: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And: 'Do not exalt yourselves above Allah. I come to you with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not think yourselves to be above God: I have come to you with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and do not exalt yourselves in defiance of Allah. I have come to you with a clear authority (as a Messenger).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not consider yourselves above God? I shall show you a manifest authority (in support of my truthfulness).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And saying, “And do not rebel against Allah; I have brought a clear proof to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And exalt not yourselves against Allah. Truly, I have come to you with a manifest authority."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that do not exalt yourselves against Allah, surely I will bring to you a clear authority:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and, 'Rise not up against God; behold, I come to you with a clear authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And saying: Be not proud against Allah. Lo! I bring you a clear warrant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not set yourselves above God: I bring you clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And saying exalt not yourselves against Allah; verily I have come Unto you with an authority manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not defy Allah. Indeed I bring you a manifest authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And be not arrogant as against Allah: for I come to you with authority manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And exalt not (yourselves) against Allah. Truly, I have come to you with a manifest authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not rise up against Allah, I come to you with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And, “Do not exalt yourselves above God. I come to you with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:19] and, ‘Do not rebel, [do not] try to act strong, against God, by neglecting obedience to Him. Lo! I bring you a clear warrant’, [clear] proof of [the sincerity of] my Mission — but they threatened to stone him to death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And saying: Be not proud against Allah) nor lie against Him. (Lo! I bring you a clear warrant) a clear proof and plain warrant.
